content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2018 Sugar Bowl Packages

Tied for the second-oldest bowl game in the country (only the Rose Bowl is older) the Sugar Bowl will celebrate its 84th anniversary in 2018. The Sugar Bowl will have a little something extra to celebrate in 2018, as it will serve as one of two semi-finals for the 2018 College Football Championship. The Sugar Bowl takes place annually in alluring New Orleans, and never fails to be a highlight of bowl season.

Dynamic New Orleans is one of the most visited cities in the country and for good reason. From the historic reminders of years past, to the hottest entertainment of the present day, there’s something for everyone. In early 2018, thousands of lucky fans will descend on The Big Easy and experience everything it has to offer: outstanding food, world-famous music, and of course, one of football’s most exciting games.

Complete 2018 Sugar Bowl packages available from $1,285 per person (based on double occupancy).
